channel.title: Stephen Fry on Language
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J7E-aoXLZGY
This is a few months old, and I think I posted this on mitb a while back. But, I think there is more relevance for it being posted over here. I see people trying to big themselves up above others by correcting spelling, grammar and the way people produce their sentences.
If you're on one of those people, and I admit - I've done it and do it too (though, rarely random attacks, like many on here are guilty of), watch the video - and rethink your ways!

item.title: Stephen Fry on Language
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I am a huge fan of everything Stephen Fry does, and this is excellent as per all of his work. Thanks for this
